title: FPS capped at 60 plz help!
body: i went to go play some lol the other day and my fps is capped at 60 i have the xbox dvr off and vsync off but it still is just capped at 60

replies.body: You might have it manually capped!  While in-game, go to your video options and check the dropdown of your frame rate.  You'll want to have it set to uncapped or a higher option!
its set to uncapped and still stuck at 60

Thanks for the clarification!  Run through our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide in case there might be driver or game files causing your frames to drop.

You can also use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to help.  Just test it out in a custom game so you don't run into any issues during a serious match!
iv run through the fps issues guide nothing worked i updated my drivers fixed my game files and its not my comp cant go everything over 60 every setting low med high it sits on 60

Well crap. :(  Hit us up in a ticket, and our tech team can work with you individually and figure out just what the hell is going on.  Grab the logs provided in the repair tool as well, and attach it to your ticket for context.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can.
